system_url.title: Qualtrics URL
system_url.description: The base URL of the Qualtrics tenant you want to register

kyma_cluster.title: Cluster Domain
kyma_cluster.description: The domain of the cluster. For example, `demo.cluster.extend.cx.cloud.sap`

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the REST APIS should be registered for consumption
